sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Navbar, Nav, Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Header.css"; function Header() { const [isAccountHovered, setIsAccountHovered] = useState(false); const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); // Track login status const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("token"); // Clear user token setIsLoggedIn(false); // Update login state }; return ( <> {/* Primary Navigation */}
{/* Logo */} {/* Navbar Links */}
Shop Blog About Us Rewards Contact Find In Store
{/* Account and Cart */}
setIsAccountHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsAccountHovered(false)} > {isLoggedIn ? "Your Account" : "Account"} {isAccountHovered && (
{isLoggedIn ? ( <> Your Account ) : ( <> Log in Register )}
)}
Cart (0)
); } export default Header;
